entry: Your selflessness brought an estranged family back together.
This is something no amount of meditating could achieve.
My brother and I came to the agreement that you should collect me.
My unknown power might help you on your quest.
►I don't know if I can accept that… @accept
accept: We don't accept a “no” for an answer. @fate
idea: Good to see that you agree. @fate
fate: This is the inevitable fate of my existence.
And I couldn't be happier to be at your side.
I hope my power is useful to you.
You should continue your quest now!
